backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling supporter requests, supporter management, and user profile storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor data structures and a run function to convert stored state between versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app with ThemeProvider and AgeGate, and initializes the router.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age-verification component requiring users to confirm they are 18+ before accessing the site.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides authentication UI, profile navigation, and admin-claim actions based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/community/Linkif: Parses text into tokens and renders links and video embeds safely without innerHTML.
frontend/src/components/community/Modera: Shows moderation queue items with approve/reject actions and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Displays a poll with voting UI, results, supporter badge, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists polls and provides a form for creating new polls with option limits and error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Provides edit and delete buttons for posts with dialogs for updating fields or confirming removal.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Handles loading, displaying, and submitting comments with authentication checks and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Creates a blob URL from image bytes and renders an attached post image.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Displays like count and toggles like/unlike actions with backend availability checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Streams and displays an attached video using a direct URL from an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Renders a responsive 16:9 iframe embed for approved video providers.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Shows a fullscreen lightbox for gallery media with navigation, favorite toggling, and optional deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Allows uploading image or video files with validation, progress tracking, and metadata input.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the siteâ€™s main layout with header, navigation, footer, and outlet for routed pages.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Displays a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Renders responsive navigation links with active-state highlighting for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Image uploader component for profile avatars with validation, preview handling, and blob conversion.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Full profile edit form handling display name, bio, avatar, links, plushie images, and saving to backend.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: Manages uploading, previewing, and removing multiple plushie images with validation and blob conversion.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a grid of profile-related images using their direct URLs.
Renders a list of external profile links with sanitized URLs.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Shows a styled supporter badge with a heart icon.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines article structure and provides sample plushie-related articles.
frontend/src/content/teddyStorybook.ts: Exports a short storybook entry about Teddy's forest adventure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryFavorites.t: Hook for managing gallery favorites using localStorage with toggle and lookup functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryMediaQuerie: React-query hooks for listing, adding, and deleting gallery media items using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client creation, login flow, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including directory listings, profile pages, and caller profile editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: General data hooks for posts, moderation, and admin checks with create, edit, delete, and list operations via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Hook to check availability of a static asset using a HEAD/GET strategy and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: Hooks for querying, submitting, and approving supporter-related data and requests using the actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based theme definitions with a light plush aesthetic and global styles for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the site's mission, values, offerings, and guidelines using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Displays a grid of adult pacifier brands with descriptions and specialties, plus an info section about the list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Shows a full article based on URL slug with category, read time, summary, and formatted content.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in card format with category, read time, title, and summary, linking to article detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a community board with post creation, media uploads, moderation, likes, comments, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that sends email via mailto and lets users copy the contact address.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Allows users to view and create events with validation, backend error handling, and date formatting.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Interactive gallery page with search, favorites, lightbox navigation, and authenticated deletion of uploaded media.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero image, brand intro, and links to articles and community sections.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of curated plushie brands with descriptions and specialties.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page supporting viewing, editing, following, liking, and handling empty-state or error scenarios.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Lists public profiles with loading and error states and allows authenticated users to create their own profile.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: React page allowing users to submit supporter requests and admins to approve or revoke them while displaying supporter data.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Utilities to detect, sanitize, and convert backend errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/galleryMedia.ts: Defines gallery item types and utilities to merge static, storybook, and uploaded media into a unified list.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Helpers for validating, reading, and formatting image files for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text into tokens for URLs and video embeds with safe normalization.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Utilities for converting files to ExternalBlob, preview URLs, and retrieving blob URLs for profile images.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks reachability of static assets using HEAD with GET fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Provides accepted video MIME types, a 100MB size limit, a file-size formatter, and a validator for uploaded video files.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Parses URLs to detect YouTube or Vimeo videos and returns a normalized embed descriptor or null.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state, feature list, and pending requests for gallery media deletion features.
